title: Jon Karl & Chuck Todd talk about covering President Trump from the front row
description: Jon Karl, ABC News Chief White House correspondent and author of the new book "Front Row at the Trump Show" talks to Chuck Todd about their experiences in the White House briefing room and covering President Trump.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
